snippet: An amendment criminalizes “using an animal for personal sexual activities” and punishes offenders with fines of as much as $34,000.
abstract: Germany’s upper house of Parliament votes to criminalize for the first time 'using an animal for personal sexual activities' and to punish offenders with fines of as much as $34,000.
lead_paragraph: An amendment criminalizes “using an animal for personal sexual activities” and punishes offenders with fines of as much as $34,000.

headline.main: German Legislators Vote to Outlaw Bestiality
headline.print_headline: German Legislators Vote to Outlaw Bestiality
